body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Restaurants              Restaurants        "Latitude 37" at Wahweap Marina NPS Photo       There are restaurants within the park at Wahweap, Bullfrog, and Antelope Point. There are no restaurants at Halls Crossing or Hite. The city of Page has numerous restaurant and fast food options.
title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Restaurants
